casebody.data:
Joseph A.F. SADOWSKI, Appellant,
v.
David W. HARMON, Respondent; Wendy K. Cardali, Nonparty-Respondent. Motion No: 2018-233 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided May 1, 2018

Motion for reargument denied. Motion for poor person relief dismissed as academic. Motion for a stay dismissed as academic. Motion for ancillary relief dismissed upon the ground that this Court does not have jurisdiction to entertain it (see NY Const, art VI, § 3 ).
